item.title: Android Trainer
item.description: Create an Android app for help coaches and users to realize power trainings using generic purpose devices, like a smartphone and a smartwatch. For realize the measurings of the trainings it uses the watch accelerometers and gyroscope. These sensors send the data to the smartphone. After it is processed it is shown in a user friendly user interface .

item.title: Arduino Coil Gun
item.description:
Using an Arduino to control and display the different stages between a coil gun, charged and fire. Close the charge stage once the capacitors are charged, display the info at the LCD screen and using a relay control the fire button. Code and instructions available soon on GitHub.

https://github.com/approdriguez/arduino-coil-gun

item.title: Granada Game Jam
item.description:
I have always loved games. I enjoy playing games but I haven’t made one and wanted to create some content and share it with the community. So we arranged a four people team and decided to use Godot engine (an open source game engine). After the brainstorm, we decided to make a survival-type in a undiscovered world where some insects spawn and try to kill you. Feel free to play the game and contribute!

https://github.com/jesusgn90/game-jam-granada-2017
